name: Winfield-Scott Campus (Grades 3-8)
description: Winfield-Scott Campus serves: Elementary grades: 3, 4, 5 and Middle School: 6, 7, 8 The middle school curriculum includes the ability to compete as members of one or more of Lilienthal’s sports teams, which include baseball, softball, volleyball, basketball, track, and soccer.

whatTheyOffer: Winfield-Scott Campus serves: Elementary grades: 3, 4, 5 and Middle School: 6, 7, 8 The middle school curriculum includes the ability to compete as members of one or more of Lilienthal’s sports teams, which include baseball, softball, volleyball, basketball, track, and soccer.
howToGetIt: To apply: A tour is required prior to application process please call office for next available tour date and time.
cost: This is a fee based service, sliding scale is available with proof of income requirements.
address: 3950 Sacramento St., SAN FRANCISCO, CA., San Francisco, CA, 94118
